Hello Resubian! Sorry about the inconvenience with this. Were you doing Solo Team Builder? 

Unfortunately, there is a bug right now that doesn't allow you to load in as a chroma when loading into the game through Team Builder solo queue. :< Rest assured, we are currently working on a fix for this bug!
I was able to fix it by reselecting the chroma at the last possible stage. Yes this was solo
